column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh: A truck overloaded with sand went crunch
column4: causing traffic jams at the north of Wat Phnom on Street 47 and Street 90 at 14:20 on the 19th. July 2019.------Sources say------ the truck was travelling from Road 90 and tried to turn left onto Road 47 when it collapsed in the middle of the road causing traffic congestion.------What happened to the driver is unclear.
